name: USPS Priority Shipping (USA only)
description:
Media mail too slow? Want your books faster?

* for USA only

Add this to your cart IN ADDITION to the regular shipping price for the books you are purchasing. Sorry for the inconvenience but the BigCartel shipping cost system is very limited.

* be sure to select the rate for 1 or 2 books from the drop-down menu

name: Mecha Zone 1.5 and 2 combo deal
description:
By popular demand! Enough people have asked for a combo package that it would be silly if I didn't offer one.

What you get in this combo deal:
- Mecha Zone 1.5 second edition book, signed
- Mecha Zone 2 book, signed
- A savings of about $10.

<iframe width="368" height="217" src="http://www.youtube.com/embed/VPz1QO25hK0?rel=0" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>

name: Mecha Zone 1.5 Art Book
description:
David White is proud to present a completely re-worked and enhanced edition of his original robot art book, MECHA ZONE 1.

MECHA ZONE 1.5 features 96 pages of exciting and unique mechanical creations! The wide variety of anime and military inspired designs are a treat for any robot fan.

-Hardcover
-96 full-color pages (originally 64)
-More than 30 original robot designs
-Re-mastered layout and larger size. Now 8.5" x 11"
-New cover artwork and bonus interior art

* MECHA ZONE 1.5 features completely different content than MECHA ZONE 2.

<iframe width="368" height="217" src="http://www.youtube.com/embed/A_WtX76m99c?rel=0" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>

name: Mecha Zone 2 Art Book
description:
David has designed and illustrated robots for many of today’s most popular franchises including MechWarrior 4, Transformers, and Battletech. Mecha Zone 2 showcases twenty-four of his most recent personal and freelance robotic creations.

Mecha Zone 2 also features tips and tutorials for creating your own robots. Follow David’s creative process in an exclusive step-by-step walk-through, which features an all-new robot made just for this book!

- 112 full-color pages
- Hardcover
- 24 unique robot designs
- tutorials and techniques
- 8.5" x 11"

* MECHA ZONE 2 features completely different content than MECHA ZONE 1.5.

<iframe width="368" height="279" src="http://www.youtube.com/embed/rqZ4SZ4oCwg?rel=0" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>

name: Ammo Pack #1
description:
A fun mix of mecha themed goodies! Ammo Pack #1 includes...

    • 4x signed mecha art cards (5.5" x 8.5")
    • 3x vinyl stickers. 1 logo sticker and 2 mecha stickers
    • 1x Embroidered Mecha Zone legion patch (3.25" x 2.75")

    • OPTIONAL: Mecha Zone themed keychain (+ $1.50)

**Shipping prices***
USA = $1.50
Canada = $2.60
Everywhere else = $4.60

name: Mecha Zone Patch
description:
Embroidered patch

- 3.25" x 2.75"
- Iron on backing

* Please contact me directly for orders of more than 3 patches for a discount.

**Shipping prices***
USA = $1.00
Canada = $1.50
Everywhere else = $2.25

name: Mechanaut: Crystal
description:
Mechanauts are 6" warriors from a place beyond time and space. 

*Intended for adult collectors; NOT FOR CHILDREN
Each Mechanaut is a piece of original art that is printed on my personal 3D printer and then refined by hand to a clean and shiny finish. Mechanauts are made of sturdy ABS plastic, but care should be taken when handling them as they are not intended for rugged play.

Limited edition of 8. Compatible with 5mm accessories.
- 8 points of articulation. Neck, waist, shoulders, hips, and wrists.

Accessories included: 
  - Fists with peg holes
  - Jet-pack (glow in the dark)
  - Interchangeable gun parts
  - Limited edition print.

Shipping:
- USA orders will go USPS priority
- All international orders will go USPS first class international. If you want it shipped another way, then please pay for the regular shipping and message me with your request. I'll calculate an adjusted price and send you a bill for the difference.

name: Bad ass mecha pilot Letterpress print
description: The "Bad Ass" mecha pilot print is a limited edition letterpress made in conjunction with the FOE sub-culture art gallery in Northampton, Massachusetts. Each two-color print was made by hand on a real letterpress printer. These prints are not from a copy machine! The prints are on heavy stock paper to enhance the letterpress impression. Each is signed and numbered by me. - 8.5" x 11" - hand printed - heavy paper stock with cotton fiber - limited edition of 50 - Autographed by illustrator (me) - AMAZING PRICE! Many have already sold. Very limited quantities remain! The sample image is a scan of an actual print.

name: Hawk Mecha Poster
description:
18' x 24" full color poster

Ships separately, rolled, in a sturdy cardboard tube.

name: Dasher II original Battletech artwork
description:
An original piece of pen and ink artwork created for the Catalyst Games book, "Battletech: Technical Readout 3085".

Pen and ink on bristol board (no shading). Measures 11" x 14". This set includes a separate background image (second picture).

I will include a print of the final shaded artwork with each piece.

name: Incubus II original Battletech artwork
description:
An original piece of pen and ink artwork created for the Catalyst Games book, "Battletech: Technical Readout PROTOTYPES".

Pen and ink on white paper (no shading). The paper is a special coated stock from Japan and measures 10 1/8" x 14 3/8". Vertical orientation.

I will include a print of the final shaded artwork with each piece.
